description: Automatically send personalized messages to your LinkedIn connections

defaultArgument.message:
Hey #firstName#,

I sent you this message thanks to an awesome Phantombuster API: https://phantombuster.com/api-store/9227/linkedin-message-sender!

Can't wait to know more about you!

Best regards

spreadsheetUrl.label: Spreadsheet URL of profiles
spreadsheetUrl.helper: Enter either a Google Spreadsheet URL or a CSV URL (make sure your file is publicly available)

columnName.label: Column name where profile URLs are stored
columnName.helper: By default, we'll use the first column of your spreadsheet (column A)

profilesPerLaunch.label: Number of profiles to send messages per launch (max: 10)
profilesPerLaunch.helper: You can leave this field empty if you want to send a message to all profiles

message.label: Message
helpers: You are limited by LinkedIn to 7000 characters
Use #firstName# to insert the firstname of the person in your message
You can use custom tags in this API

hunterApiKey.label: Email discovery: Hunter.io API key (optional) (?)
hunterApiKey.helper: Leave this field empty if you don't want to use Hunter.io
